title: Installing Windows 10 on a Mac - Boot Camp Bonanza - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
tags: Installing Windows 10 on a Mac - Boot Camp Bonanza - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
description: Krazy Ken needs to install Windows 10 on a Mac via Boot Camp Assistant; this will allow him to setup for a future experiment! But when The Curse strikes, Maniac Mike steps in to save the day.  Support the show and get in the credits   Want more videos like this?   Subscribe for more tech videos!    Like the CC on Facebook   Follow the CC on Twitter   Follow Ken on Twitter: @Hildron101010  Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures #98 - Installing Windows 10 on a Mac - Boot Camp Bonanza  Pledge on PATREON now to get your name in the show credits and gain access to Krazy Ken's exclusive Discord server!*   Contact the CC    Want music for your videos?   (We use these guys a lot. They're good.)  Get film gear Ken uses   On a lower budget?   Amazon links are powered by the Amazon Associates Program.  COMPUTER CLAN COLLABORATORS INVOLVED IN THIS VIDEO midnightxenesis - as Maniac Mike Ken (Hildron101010)  *not all Patreon tiers qualify for all rewards  #KrazyKen
